attributes.action: Parking Permits for trades people to park anywhere whilst working
attributes.additional_details: Being a tradesperson in London is so difficult. It’s a battle with the parking wardens in residence. Only areas when a lot of the time there are spaces but nowhere to park. We are just trying to do a job which is benefiting and making the infrastructure of England stronger and whilst doing it having to worry about parking tickets and getting fines for trying to do a job is a headache that shouldn’t exist a parking permit should exist like the disabled people have , me and we can carry out the job without worrying about getting constant finds, especially London. It makes every tradesperson job very stressful.
attributes.background: Give construction workers and people helping with the infrastructure of the country. The ability to have a permit to park anywhere that is safe to do so without worrying about getting tickets whilst they are working on a job.

rejection.details:
Parking permit schemes are a matter for local authorities.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
